{{tag.tagText}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { TagbookService } from '../services/tagbook.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.css'] }) export class TagsComponent { public tagsList: [{ tagId: number; tagText: string; notesTags: [] }] | undefined; public tag!: { tagId: number; tagText: string; notesTags: [] }; constructor(public tagbook: TagbookService) { tagbook.getTags().subscribe(tags => { this.tagsList = tags; }) /* tagbook.saveTag(this.tag).subscribe(tag => { tag = this.tag; })*/ } }
